featured.text: When she applied for admission to a local music school in 1917, she was turned down because she was black.

Admission for guests with special needs is free, and fees for the general public are set at a much discounted price so that people of all ages and abilities can come together and play in a fun and safe environment.

definition.zh_def: 入場、入學或接受的許可或權利。
definition.en_def: The act of allowing someone to enter a place or join a group.
definition.example: Her admission to the university was a proud moment for her family.
